column5: I am headed to the Winnipeg river just north of Kenora on sept. 22nd thru 30th. What do you think would be the best approach to catching eyes and northern.
Bring a Gun, you don't have a chance to catch them with a rod and reel.
>I am headed to the Winnipeg >river just north of Kenora >on sept. 22nd thru 30th. > What do you think >would be the best approach >to catching eyes and northern. >

I have heard that there is a great fishing hole that goes by the nickname "Walleye Wall". It is rumored that you can catch your days limit in an hour! You may want to ask the locals about it. Good Luck Marcel.
